content:
OperationContractGenerationContext Class

Definition

Passed to the stem.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension.GenerateOperation* method to enable the modification of an operation contract and its context prior to generating code.

In this Article

public class OperationContractGenerationContext
Inheritance
System.Object
OperationContractGenerationContext

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Examples

The following example shows the use of the OperationContractGenerationContext object passed to the GenerateOperation method to add code comments extracted from custom WSDL elements. 

public void GenerateOperation(OperationContractGenerationContext context)
{
  context.SyncMethod.Comments.AddRange(Formatter.FormatComments(commentText));
  Console.WriteLine("In generate operation.");
}

The following code example shows the resulting code comments. 


'''From WSDL Documentation:
'''
'''<summary>This contract is a stateless contract that provides a mechanism for 
'''computing the nth Fibonacci term.</summary> 
'''
<System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratedCodeAttribute("System.ServiceModel", "3.0.0.0"),  _
 System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute([Namespace]:="http://microsoft.wcf.documentation", ConfigurationName:="IFibonacci")>  _
Public Interface IFibonacci
    
    '''From WSDL Documentation:
    '''
    '''<summary>The Compute operation returns the nth Fibonacci number.  Because it 
    '''uses dual recursion it's very inefficient and therefore useful to demonstrate 
    '''caching.</summary><returns>The nth Fibonacci number.</returns><param 
    '''name="num">The value to use when computing the Fibonacci number.</param> 
    '''
    <System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute(Action:="http://microsoft.wcf.documentation/IFibonacci/Compute", ReplyAction:="http://microsoft.wcf.documentation/IFibonacci/ComputeResponse")>  _
    Function Compute(ByVal num As Integer) As Integer
    
    '''From WSDL Documentation:
    '''
    '''<summary>The GetPerson operation tests custom WSDL documentation 
    '''generation.</summary><returns>The Person object to be returned.</returns><param 
    '''name="FirstParameter">The value for the first parameter.</param><param 
    '''name="SecondParameter">The value for the second parameter.</param> 
    '''
    <System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute(Action:="http://microsoft.wcf.documentation/IFibonacci/GetPerson", ReplyAction:="http://microsoft.wcf.documentation/IFibonacci/GetPersonResponse")>  _
    Function GetPerson(ByVal FirstParameter As Integer, ByVal SecondParameter As Integer) As Microsoft.WCF.Documentation.Person
End Interface

/// From WSDL Documentation:
/// 
/// <summary>This contract is a stateless contract that provides a mechanism for 
/// computing the nth Fibonacci term.</summary> 
/// 
[System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratedCodeAttribute("System.ServiceModel", "3.0.0.0")]
[System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute(Namespace="http://microsoft.wcf.documentation", ConfigurationName="IFibonacci")]
public interface IFibonacci
{
    
    /// From WSDL Documentation:
    /// 
    /// <summary>The Compute operation returns the nth Fibonacci number.  Because it 
    /// uses dual recursion it's very inefficient and therefore useful to demonstrate 
    /// caching.</summary><returns>The nth Fibonacci number.</returns><param 
    /// name="num">The value to use when computing the Fibonacci number.</param> 
    /// 
    [System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute(Action="http://microsoft.wcf.documentation/IFibonacci/Compute", ReplyAction="http://microsoft.wcf.documentation/IFibonacci/ComputeResponse")]
    int Compute(int num);
    
    /// From WSDL Documentation:
    /// 
    /// <summary>The GetPerson operation tests custom WSDL documentation 
    /// generation.</summary><returns>The Person object to be returned.</returns><param 
    /// name="FirstParameter">The value for the first parameter.</param><param 
    /// name="SecondParameter">The value for the second parameter.</param> 
    /// 
    [System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute(Action="http://microsoft.wcf.documentation/IFibonacci/GetPerson", ReplyAction="http://microsoft.wcf.documentation/IFibonacci/GetPersonResponse")]
    Microsoft.WCF.Documentation.Person GetPerson(int FirstParameter, int SecondParameter);
}

Remarks

Use the OperationContractGenerationContext object passed to the GenerateOperation method to modify the code document object model prior to the generation of code. Typically, the System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension interface is implemented on a custom System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension implementation that is used to import custom WSDL elements or otherwise modify the code at the service or operation level. To modify the code at the service level, see System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.

Constructors

public OperationContractGenerationContext (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator serviceContractGenerator, System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext contract, System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription operation, System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration declaringType, System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod syncMethod, System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod beginMethod, System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod endMethod, System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod taskMethod);

Properties

BeginMethod

Gets the CodeMemberMethod for the asynchronous begin operation.

public System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod BeginMethod { get; }
Value
CodeMemberMethod

The CodeMemberMethod for the asynchronous begin operation. Returns null if the operation is a synchronous operation.

Remarks

Use the BeginMethod to examine or modify the asynchronous begin method that represents the operation to be generated.

Contract

Gets the code generation context for the service contract.

public System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext Contract { get; }
Value
ServiceContractGenerationContext

The ServiceContractGenerationContext for the current operation.

Remarks

Use the Contract property to obtain the contract generation context for the service contract that contains the operation.

DeclaringType

Gets the declaring type for the current operation.

public System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration DeclaringType { get; }
Value
CodeTypeDeclaration

The declaring type for the current operation.

Remarks

Use the DeclaringType property to examine or modify the code type declaration for the current operation.

EndMethod

Gets the asynchronous end operation declaration.

public System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod EndMethod { get; }
Value
CodeMemberMethod

The asynchronous end operation. Returns null if the operation is a synchronous operation.

Remarks

Use the EndMethod property to examine or modify the asynchronous end method that models an asynchronous operation.

IsAsync

Gets a value that indicates whether asynchronous methods are generated for the current operation.

public bool IsAsync { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the operation is asynchronous; otherwise, false.

IsTask

Gets a value that indicates whether a task is generated for the current operation.

public bool IsTask { get; }
Value
Boolean

True if a task is generated for the current operation; otherwise, false.

Operation

Gets the OperationDescription for the current operation.

public System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription Operation { get; }
Value
OperationDescription

The OperationDescription for the current operation.

Remarks

Use the Operation property to examine operation information prior to generating code for that operation.

ServiceContractGenerator

Gets the ServiceContractGenerator that generates the current operation.

public System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator ServiceContractGenerator { get; }
Value
ServiceContractGenerator

The ServiceContractGenerator that generates the current operation.

Remarks

Use the ServiceContractGenerator property to examine or modify the object that generates code for the current operation.

SyncMethod

Gets the CodeMemberMethod for the synchronous operation.

public System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod SyncMethod { get; }
Value
CodeMemberMethod

The CodeMemberMethod for the synchronous operation.

Remarks

Use the SyncMethod property to examine or modify the synchronous operation before it is generated.

TaskMethod

Gets the CodeMemberMethod for the task operation.

public System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod TaskMethod { get; }
Value
CodeMemberMethod

The CodeMemberMethod for the task operation.
